item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump says he's doubling steel tariff to 50%
item.description: President Donald Trump made the announcement during a rally in Pennsylvania to discuss the "partnership" between U.S. Steel and Japan-based Nippon.

item.title: GOP senators plan hearing on Biden's perceived cognitive decline
item.description: The hearing, slated for next month, will investigate "who was running the country" during Biden's "decline."
